title: #18 - Timothy Brittain-Catlin
itunes:title: #18 - Timothy Brittain-Catlin
description: Dr Timothy Brittain-Catlin is Course Leader for the MSt Architecture Apprenticeship at the University of Cambridge. He has also just published a new book, 'The Edwardians and their Houses', the first radical appraisal of the subject for 40 years.
